title: Khloé Kardashian Says That She's Fully Over the Jordyn Woods/Tristan Thompson Drama
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Khloé Kardashians says that she isn't holding a grudge against Jordyn Woods or Tristan Thompson.

She also says that she wants all of them to "move on" and "be happy, successful people."

As the new season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians creeps closer and closer, Khloé would like to clarify that she's done having any drama with Jordyn Woods or her ex Tristan Thompson.

Khloé went on Ryan Seacrest's radio show yesterday, and Ryan took the opportunity to ask how she truly felt when Jordyn asked Kylie if she could reach out to Khloé with a handwritten letter to explain herself and apologize. Khloé replied:



I know everybody makes mistakes, I think it's how you handle it and I think apologies need to be as loud as your disrespect was or to me it's not sincere. I'm forgiving. I'm forgiven. I'm not someone who holds a grudge. If I do that it's only going to affect me...that chapter is closed for me. I want all of us to move on and to be happy, successful people. I just want everyone to just be better people with each day. That's genuinely how I feel. You know, that's really it.

And not only has Khloé moved on, but she's also found the positives in the situation. She told Ryan, "Things have to happen to me for me to become a better person as well, and if we can’t laugh at it, what in the hell am I going to do? Sit in a ball and cry?...You have to laugh and still move on with life and know that everything is going to be okay."

So basically Khloé is thriving, thanks for asking!!
